sections.name: Overview
sections.contents: QuaSim is an educational game-based simulator that provides students with practical experience in the principles of Quantum Cryptography. Funded by grants from the NSF and NSA, QuaSim has resulted in several publications since its conception in 2016.

sections.name: Features
sections.contents:
• 4 Lesson Modules
  • Adaptive Challenges and Hints
  • Virtual Assistant/Narrator
  • Cooperative and Competitive Play Modes

sections.name: Responsibilities
sections.contents: As the lead developer for QuaSim, I was responsible for the design and implementation of the game architecture of our lesson system and its integration with Unreal Engine 4. I was also responsible for the implementation of any lesson-specific requirements.
